SELECT A.* , (CASE WHEN B.project_pl IS NOT NULL THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ) AS mb_projectPlYn , (CASE WHEN B.NO IS NOT NULL THEN B.NO WHEN C.NO IS NOT NULL THEN C.NO ELSE 0 END ) AS mb_projectNo , (CASE WHEN C.NO IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT E.main_work FROM business E WHERE E.NO = C.NO) ELSE '본사' END ) AS mb_workNm
FROM doollee_members A LEFT JOIN business B ON A.mb_id = B.project_pl AND B.to_dt >= DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%Y%m%d') LEFT JOIN doollee_project_team C ON A.mb_id = C.project_team_id AND C.tuip_ed_dt >= DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%Y%m%d') WHERE A.mb_id = #{in_id} AND A.mb_password = password(#{in_pw})
